title: Vernon (Seldon) Stone
subTitle: Software Automation Engineer and QA Lead | Streamlining Processes, Enhancing Efficiency, and Ensuring Quality
body: Hi, my name is Vernon, but I go by Seldon. I'm a passionate software automation engineer and QA lead with over 12 years of experience in the industry who is actively looking for a new adventure. In the meantime I'm learning new software technologies and frameworks as well as maintaining my other passion FishHop.com.
